LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: 「We're ready.」

LABEL: 0x2E0
STRING: By the time I returned to the <SHEEP III> with Hiragino, the date was about to change.

LABEL: 0x33B
STRING: The fourth day since the accident――

LABEL: 0x36C
STRING: That said, I had long since lost my sense of time.

LABEL: 0x3AA
STRING: Isolated from the surface of the Earth and out of reach of daylight,

LABEL: 0x3E2
STRING: the 24-hour window only served to make me feel nostalgic.

LABEL: 0x422
STRING: It was an artificial boundary of time that had no meaning.

LABEL: 0x45A
STRING: Nothing more than a ritual.

LABEL: 0x486
STRING: No more than a prayer.

LABEL: 0x4A4
STRING: To return to that world of sunshine again――

LABEL: 0x5E1
STRING: 「I'll go over it again.」

LABEL: 0x603
STRING: 「First, one of us will escape in a diving suit――」

LABEL: 0x633
STRING: 「After that, we'll cause an ozone explosion, and everyone who's left will surface after them.」

LABEL: 0x679
STRING: 「Everyone with me so far?」

LABEL: 0x6AE
STRING: We were once again gathered inside the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x6D4
STRING: We couldn't hide the exhaustion on our faces.

LABEL: 0x70C
STRING: As Yukari repeated herself once more, each of us nodded in agreement.

LABEL: 0x756
STRING: Everything was ready―it was perfect.

LABEL: 0x77C
STRING: But, the wheelhouse stiffened at that moment.

LABEL: 0x7AC
STRING: Everyone knew.

LABEL: 0x7CE
STRING: The time had come to make the one choice that we had turned away from.

LABEL: 0x81E
STRING: The one person who would certainly be saved――

LABEL: 0x844
STRING: Not by a reckless explosion, but by a more reliable method.

LABEL: 0x882
STRING: ...Who were we going to save?

LABEL: 0x8A6
STRING: Who should be sent to the surface first?

LABEL: 0x8D4
STRING: I surveyed the wheelhouse again.

LABEL: 0x90E
STRING: We had to choose.

LABEL: 0x93E
STRING: One person from among us――

LABEL: 0x9F8
STRING: ――But, who?

LABEL: 0xA27
STRING: 「I'm staying.」

LABEL: 0xB3E
STRING: Yukari broke the heavy silence.

LABEL: 0xBD2
STRING: 「To begin with, I'm a ROMLES employee and an attendant of the <SHEEP III>...」

LABEL: 0xC15
STRING: 「It's only natural to prioritize the lives of your passengers.」

LABEL: 0xC54
STRING: 「What are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0xC7E
STRING: 「We've been trying to escape together up until now, haven't we?」

LABEL: 0xCBC
STRING: 「Why are you bringing up your crew member card only at times like these...?」

LABEL: 0xD01
STRING: 「If "only one person dies," that might not be a good enough reason.」

LABEL: 0xD57
STRING: 「But if "only one person survives," isn't that reason enough to avoid being chosen?」

LABEL: 0xE3E
STRING: 「Besides...」

LABEL: 0xE5A
STRING: 「To put it bluntly, I'm the reason this accident turned into this mess.」

LABEL: 0xEAC
STRING: 「It all started on the first day... My judgment was wrong.」

LABEL: 0xEEA
STRING: 「It was a sudden accident, but as long as we made the right decisions...」

LABEL: 0xF44
STRING: 「...We could have saved the people in the rear section.」

LABEL: 0xF85
STRING: Was that a small smile on Yukari's face?

LABEL: 0xFB1
STRING: It was true that she was an employee of ROMLES, but that was exactly why she'd worked so hard to lead us...

LABEL: 0x1017
STRING: No―it was not a given that we were going to die.

LABEL: 0x1047
STRING: As she said, we were going to decide who would leave "first" and survive.

LABEL: 0x108D
STRING: Don't be mistaken.

LABEL: 0x10B1
STRING: This was only a matter of order.

LABEL: 0x10DD
STRING: There was still hope for all of us to be saved.

LABEL: 0x1109
STRING: Hiragino cleared his throat and took out another xylitol tablet.

LABEL: 0x11C9
STRING: 「Like Momoi, I'm a ROMLES employee... whether I like it or not.」

LABEL: 0x1229
STRING: 「At the very least, I can't be the one to survive ahead of all of you.」

LABEL: 0x1284
STRING: 「But, Hiragino-san――」

LABEL: 0x12B9
STRING: 「If Momoi made an error and made our situation worse on this ship...」

LABEL: 0x130F
STRING: 「Then, I'm responsible for the many lives that were lost.」

LABEL: 0x138B
STRING: 「I was assigned here in order to save lives in case something happened to begin with.」

LABEL: 0x13EB
STRING: 「But in the end, I could do nothing. I allowed so many people to die.」

LABEL: 0x1447
STRING: 「If I survive, I won't be able to face them.」

LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: Hiragino's declaration was resolute... I could sense his firm determination.

LABEL: 0x14E2
STRING: But, I couldn't believe that Hiragino or Yukari

LABEL: 0x150E
STRING: were responsible for this accident.

LABEL: 0x1536
STRING: They probably weren't trying to force others to blame themselves,

LABEL: 0x157A
STRING: but either way, there was someone else to blame.

LABEL: 0x15B2
STRING: 「The responsibility for causing this accident――」

LABEL: 0x15DE
STRING: 「If we're talking about that, I can't go by myself.」

LABEL: 0x1658
STRING: 「As I said on the first day, I'm the cause of all of this.」

LABEL: 0x1698
STRING: 「If I hadn't rewritten the navigation program...」

LABEL: 0x16DA
STRING: 「If I hadn't wanted to know more about Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0x171C
STRING: 「This would have never happened.」

LABEL: 0x174A
STRING: 「It's my fault, and I cannot apologize enough.」

LABEL: 0x1782
STRING: 「So... I'm staying.」

LABEL: 0x17B9
STRING: 「Hm.」

LABEL: 0x17D4
STRING: As I lowered my gaze,

LABEL: 0x1800
STRING: an arrogant girl's voice entered my ears.

LABEL: 0x1890
STRING: 「Katagiri, you seem to have the wrong idea.」

LABEL: 0x18C6
STRING: 「Do you think that you broke through the security of the <SHEEP III> by yourself?」

LABEL: 0x199E
STRING: 「You moron.」

LABEL: 0x19B8
STRING: 「Everything was in the palm of my hand.」

LABEL: 0x1A43
STRING: 「You're nothing more than a tool, so it's up to you to feel guilty, but...」

LABEL: 0x1A81
STRING: 「Shouldn't you be blaming me for setting everything up?」

LABEL: 0x1ACC
STRING: I thought she was going to say she should survive, but...

LABEL: 0x1B1C
STRING: For a girl who had sacrificed everything to gain knowledge,

LABEL: 0x1B6E
STRING: to increase her own value and to survive,

LABEL: 0x1B96
STRING: to say such a thing...

LABEL: 0x1C8B
STRING: 「No, it's not Reiri's fault.」

LABEL: 0x1CB3
STRING: 「Reiri... You were the one who came up with this.」

LABEL: 0x1CED
STRING: 「But it's because I said I wanted to go to a submarine.」

LABEL: 0x1DB6
STRING: Reiri clicked her tongue.

LABEL: 0x1DD4
STRING: However, Touri continued undaunted.

LABEL: 0x1E6C
STRING: 「If only I hadn't said something weird like that...」

LABEL: 0x1E9C
STRING: 「Then Reiri would never have thought of doing this either.」

LABEL: 0x1ECC
STRING: 「That's why she tried to do something so absurd.」

LABEL: 0x1F16
STRING: 「It was all for me, right?」

LABEL: 0x1F7A
STRING: 「It's my fault.」

LABEL: 0x2004
STRING: 「...Aren't you just being conceited?」

LABEL: 0x202F
STRING: Reiri turned to Touri.

LABEL: 0x2062
STRING: 「What do you mean, "all for you?"」

LABEL: 0x2099
STRING: 「Because――」

LABEL: 0x20C4
STRING: 「It's arrogant of you to feel responsible over something like that.」

LABEL: 0x211B
STRING: 「Do you really think so?」

LABEL: 0x214C
STRING: Tokiwa interrupted the argument between the sisters.

LABEL: 0x21BE
STRING: The girl who had fallen ill with <Alice> seven years ago and was caught up in the <SHEEP III> accident without knowing anything about it.

LABEL: 0x2222
STRING: And... the owner of a world-class brain.

LABEL: 0x2252
STRING: Everyone felt somewhere in their hearts that she should be the one to survive.

LABEL: 0x22A4
STRING: She took a step forward and began to speak in a soft voice.

LABEL: 0x234E
STRING: 「――This accident began with an ozone explosion.」

LABEL: 0x2380
STRING: 「It was the ozone cage that I designed

LABEL: 0x23B4
STRING: which caused it.」

LABEL: 0x23EA
STRING: 「You could say that if I hadn't thought of it, none of this would ever have happened.」

LABEL: 0x2442
STRING: 「――In which case, I'm guilty as well.」

LABEL: 0x2495
STRING: What was she saying――

LABEL: 0x24C1
STRING: Before I knew it, I was standing up.

LABEL: 0x24EF
STRING: 「What are you talking about...?」

LABEL: 0x250F
STRING: 「Don't be crazy!」

LABEL: 0x2537
STRING: 「A well-meaning idea you thought of so many years ago bringing about a tragedy like this...」

LABEL: 0x258B
STRING: 「How could you have predicted that?!」

LABEL: 0x261C
STRING: Tokiwa nodded her head and remained calm.

LABEL: 0x265E
STRING: She smiled faintly as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x26F6
STRING: 「You're right.」

LABEL: 0x2712
STRING: 「But, isn't that the same for everyone?」

LABEL: 0x275B
STRING: She quickly raised a finger.

LABEL: 0x2781
STRING: Her finger traced her logic gently, yet somehow coldly.

LABEL: 0x27D2
STRING: 「The ozone explosion which could be said was caused by me――」

LABEL: 0x2810
STRING: 「Without it, none of what Katagiri-san and Reiri-san did would've led to such a major accident.」

LABEL: 0x286E
STRING: 「Yukari-san and Hiragino-san would've been able to do their jobs properly.」

LABEL: 0x28BC
STRING: 「How could anyone have predicted that there would be an ozone explosion?」

LABEL: 0x2947
STRING: That was... But... Still...

LABEL: 0x296D
STRING: I turned around for help.

LABEL: 0x2997
STRING: Everyone was biting their lips, unable to say anything.

LABEL: 0x29BF
STRING: I couldn't accept it.

LABEL: 0x29DF
STRING: There was no way I could.

LABEL: 0x29FF
STRING: But still――

LABEL: 0x2A83
STRING: 「Causality is formed after the fact.」

LABEL: 0x2AB1
STRING: 「As a result of act A, B occurred...」

LABEL: 0x2AE3
STRING: 「One then falsifies one's memory to say that one was doing A "knowing that B was going to happen."」

LABEL: 0x2B4F
STRING: 「In the past, not a single person could've imagined the threads of causality between A and B.」

LABEL: 0x2B9D
STRING: 「It's something made up by memories――」

LABEL: 0x2BD2
STRING: A pretense of causality―that the goal was all that came after, that the result was nothing more than that.

LABEL: 0x2C28
STRING: Tokiwa's voice alone echoed in the wheelhouse as she spoke slowly.

LABEL: 0x2C73
STRING: 「Do you remember the Heike crabs?」

LABEL: 0x2CA5
STRING: 「They didn't evolve to have human faces, despite us seeing them on their shells.」

LABEL: 0x2D05
STRING: 「When you think back on it later, it creates a false "purpose" that should never have existed.」

LABEL: 0x2D6C
STRING: ――Finding purpose in the result.

LABEL: 0x2D9C
STRING: That was the nature of human reasoning.

LABEL: 0x2DC2
STRING: To make it easier for us to interpret, to make it convenient for us to explain.

LABEL: 0x2E0C
STRING: By reason, cause and effect could be rewritten.

LABEL: 0x2E3E
STRING: By inertia, cause and effect were created later.

LABEL: 0x2EDC
STRING: 「None of you are to blame.」

LABEL: 0x2F08
STRING: 「You only want to be judged――」

LABEL: 0x2F34
STRING: 「You're only running away because it'd be easier if someone told you that you were guilty.」

LABEL: 0x2FA9
STRING: Tokiwa's voice was strong.

LABEL: 0x2FE7
STRING: There was nothing we could say in response.

LABEL: 0x301D
STRING: Only, Reiri――

LABEL: 0x30CA
STRING: She was the only one staring sternly at Tokiwa in the silence.

LABEL: 0x3173
STRING: But in the end, she turned away without saying anything.

LABEL: 0x31B9
STRING: She had done everything in order to achieve her goal, even falling into the trap that was the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x3224
STRING: What would she think if her goal, and the causality she needed to reach it, were denied?

LABEL: 0x3343
STRING: 「But, who should survive, then?」

LABEL: 0x3388
STRING: 「Hmm, about that...」

LABEL: 0x33B0
STRING: 「It's fine to worry about who to send out, but...」

LABEL: 0x33EE
STRING: 「You're making it sound like everyone but that person is going to die.」

LABEL: 0x3440
STRING: 「We'll all survive.」

LABEL: 0x34C7
STRING: 「In that sense, it doesn't matter who we send first.」

LABEL: 0x3513
STRING: 「And because of that, we'll decide it by lottery

LABEL: 0x35A9
STRING: In an instant, Tokiwa's eyes widened as if she had realized something.

LABEL: 0x36B6
STRING: 「I see! I understand!」

LABEL: 0x3751
STRING: 「Understand what?」

LABEL: 0x379E
STRING: 「――Darts!」

LABEL: 0x37C5
STRING: Yukari began to tremble beside me.

LABEL: 0x37EF
STRING: Tokiwa's darts. Horrific memories that were buried deep in our minds assailed us.

LABEL: 0x38A5
STRING: 「The time has come for me to display my talents once again.」

LABEL: 0x38E5
STRING: 「I'm raring to go!!」

LABEL: 0x393F
STRING: 「Now, everyone, let's head to the playroom――」

LABEL: 0x398A
STRING: 「W-Wait a minute!」

LABEL: 0x39BD
STRING: Tokiwa tried to leave the wheelhouse while everyone was still frozen in place.

LABEL: 0x3A1B
STRING: Yukari reached out desperately to stop her from committing any violent acts.

LABEL: 0x3A57
STRING: We were talking about something much more serious a moment ago...

LABEL: 0x3A9D
STRING: How did it come to this?

LABEL: 0x3B39
STRING: 「What's the matter, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x3B61
STRING: 「Are you saying you have a better plan than playing darts?」

LABEL: 0x3BA6
STRING: Why did Tokiwa have such absolute confidence in darts...?

LABEL: 0x3BF2
STRING: Yukari smiled gently back at her.

LABEL: 0x3CF7
STRING: 「Yes. Of course I do.」

LABEL: 0x3D1B
STRING: 「If everyone is equally responsible and no one is at fault, then――」

LABEL: 0x3D65
STRING: 「How about we send her out first?」

LABEL: 0x40DA
STRING: The emergency room――

LABEL: 0x40F2
STRING: On the other side of the door, in the treatment room, there was lone girl who continued to sleep.

LABEL: 0x41A4
STRING: 「There's one thing I want to try...」

LABEL: 0x41DA
STRING: 「Reiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x4251
STRING: 「Do you have any spare medicine?」

LABEL: 0x428A
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x42C7
STRING: Reiri handed an ampule to Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x42F3
STRING: A drug that acted as a stimulant――

LABEL: 0x4317
STRING: Reiri had said that it was a clinical trial, but it was probably a drug meant to wake one up from <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x43DD
STRING: A single hope that continued to sleep in the midst of this despair, knowing nothing.

LABEL: 0x4423
STRING: We'd return her to the surface inside a diving suit――

LABEL: 0x444D
STRING: That was what Yukari had suggested.

LABEL: 0x4574
STRING: 「It may not be lethal, but there's no point in getting yourself infected.」

LABEL: 0x45B8
STRING: 「There's the risk of droplet infection.」

LABEL: 0x45F2
STRING: 「You guys stay here.」

LABEL: 0x4621
STRING: We couldn't deny the possibility

LABEL: 0x465B
STRING: that we were all infected with <Alice> already.

LABEL: 0x4683
STRING: It was a rare virus whose natural host hadn't been found, and which had few cases of infection.

LABEL: 0x46D9
STRING: I wasn't convinced that you'd get infected that easily like Yukari was worried about, but...

LABEL: 0x4729
STRING: As a doctor, Hiragino probably couldn't ignore that risk due to his position.

LABEL: 0x4842
STRING: 「May I accompany you?」

LABEL: 0x4887
STRING: 「Tokiwa-kun――」

LABEL: 0x48B4
STRING: 「Once you've been infected with <Alice>, you should have antibodies.」

LABEL: 0x490D
STRING: 「...Right.」

LABEL: 0x4968
STRING: So, with Reiri's medicine in hand, Hiragino headed to the treatment room with Tokiwa in tow.

LABEL: 0x4C36
STRING: 「Well, then...」

LABEL: 0x4C50
STRING: It wasn't like waiting around for Hiragino was the only thing left for us to do.

LABEL: 0x4CA2
STRING: We turned to face the diving suits in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x4CE0
STRING: They were important items for our plan going forward.

LABEL: 0x4D32
STRING: We had to remove the weights from these things...

LABEL: 0x4DC4
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san knows the structure of these suits, but――」

LABEL: 0x4E67
STRING: 「...Anyway, do your best.」

LABEL: 0x4EB8
STRING: Let's just go for it, I guess.

LABEL: 0x4EF6
STRING: Taking the weights off would increase the buoyancy, but it was no easy task.

LABEL: 0x4F40
STRING: The diving suits were weighted to adjust to the weight of the person inside.

LABEL: 0x4F92
STRING: Just taking them out didn't create enough buoyancy.

LABEL: 0x4FCE
STRING: 「Just adjusting the weight isn't enough, is it?」

LABEL: 0x500F
STRING: 「Remove the extra balancer as well.」

LABEL: 0x5047
STRING: 「I can't see it being of any use while surfacing.」

LABEL: 0x5088
STRING: 「Even if you tell me that...」

LABEL: 0x511C
STRING: Still, this wasn't the time to stop like this.

LABEL: 0x5160
STRING: With great difficulty, I managed to remove the balancer.

LABEL: 0x519C
STRING: After removing all the weights from each of the two diving suits, I was completely drenched in sweat.
